title: I made a repair request and opted to send my device back myself but I'm still waiting for the label
content:
Hi,

I made a repair order to have my Pixel 5's screen replaced as I had dropped mine and cracked it. I opted to send the phone to Google myself rather than wait to have packaging shipped to me as it was faster. 

I am still waiting to receive the shipping label by email.

I have called and used the support chat several times but I haven't received any resolution.

Is there anything I can do to expedite this?

Enrico
